A letter of advice from a friend, sent to Sir Thomas Armestrong in Newgate, after the rule for his execution touching his present condition. N. T.
1 sheet ([2] p.)
Printed by Geo. Croom ..., London : 1684.
Caption title. Signed at end: N.T. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
